stages.name: Verse 26 - Part 1
stages.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَسْتَحْيِي أَن يَضْرِبَ مَثَلًا مَّا بَعُوضَةً فَمَا فَوْقَهَا
stages.english: Indeed, Allah is not timid to present an example - that of a mosquito or what is smaller than it
stages.transliteration: Innal laaha laa yastahyeee ai yazriba masalam maa ba'oozatan famaa fawqahaa
stages.instruction: Understanding that Allah can use any example to teach

stages.name: Verse 26 - Part 2
stages.arabic: فَأَمَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا فَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهُ الْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأَمَّا الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فَيَقُولُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلًا
stages.english: And as for those who believe, they know that it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they say, 'What did Allah intend by this as an example?'
stages.transliteration: Fa ammal lazeena aamanoo faya'lamoona annahul haqqu mir Rabbihim wa ammal lazeena kafaroo fa yaqooloona maazaaa araadal laahu bihaazaa masalaa
stages.instruction: Learn how different people react to Allah's parables

stages.name: Verse 26 - Part 3
stages.arabic: يُضِلُّ بِهِ كَثِيرًا وَيَهْدِي بِهِ كَثِيرًا ۚ وَمَا يُضِلُّ بِهِ إِلَّا الْفَاسِقِينَ
stages.english: He misleads many thereby and guides many thereby. And He misleads not except the defiantly disobedient
stages.transliteration: Yudillu bihee kaseeranw wa yahdee bihee kaseeraa; wa maa yudillu biheee illal faasiqeen
stages.instruction: Understand how guidance and misguidance work

stages.name: Verse 27
stages.arabic: الَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهْدَ اللَّهِ مِن بَعْدِ مِيثَاقِهِ وَيَقْطَعُونَ مَا أَمَرَ اللَّهُ بِهِ أَن يُوصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُونَ
stages.english: Those who break the covenant of Allah after contracting it and sever that which Allah has ordered to be joined and cause corruption on earth. It is those who are the losers
stages.transliteration: Allazeena yanqudoona 'ahdal laahi mim ba'di meesaaqihee wa yaqta'oona maaa amaral laahu biheee ai yoosala wa yufsidoona fil ard; ulaaa'ika humul khaasiroon
stages.instruction: Learn about those who break divine covenants

stages.name: Verse 28
stages.arabic: كَيْفَ تَكْفُرُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَكُنتُمْ أَمْوَاتًا فَأَحْيَاكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
stages.english: How can you disbelieve in Allah when you were lifeless and He brought you to life; then He will cause you to die, then He will bring you [back] to life, and then to Him you will be returned
stages.transliteration: Kaifa takfuroona billaahi wa kuntum amwaatan fa ahyaakum summa yumeetukum summa yuhyeekum summa ilaihi turja'oon
stages.instruction: Reflect on the cycle of life, death, and resurrection

stages.name: Verse 29
stages.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ لَكُم مَّا فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ اسْتَوَىٰ إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَسَوَّاهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ ۚ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
stages.english: It is He who created for you all of that which is on the earth. Then He directed Himself to the heaven and made them seven heavens, and He is Knowing of all things
stages.transliteration: Huwal lazee khalaqa lakum maa fil ardi jamee'an summas tawaaa ilas samaaa'i fasaw waahunna sab'a samaawaaat; wa Huwa bikulli shai'in Aleem
stages.instruction: Understand Allah's creation of earth and heavens
